alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL VALENCIA AND BERNALILLO COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 439 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Los Chaves, or near Los Lunas, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph will spread well ahead of this storm over Isleta Pueblo and southern Albuquerque. Localized blowing dust is also expected in dust-prone locations. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Albuquerque, Los Lunas, Belen, Valencia, Bosque Farms, Tome, Isleta Pueblo, Los Chaves, South Valley, and Los Trujillos-Gabaldon. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 195 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
